name: A Not So Silent Night
description:
Avoid hitting wienerschnitzel's fireworks, once hit you lose presents.

get hit if you have no presents and its game over.

Gain points by gathering and delivering presents to houses! (hover above the glowing fronts while having 1+ presents)

And use the powerups to your advantage!

The shield powerup grants 3s of invulnerability

The watch slows down time,

And the fireworks rocket hits wienerschnitzel making him drop a few stolen gifts!
